text: Dolgo Brdo () is a small settlement in the hills east of Ljubljana in central Slovenia. It is included in the Ljubljana Urban Municipality. It lies in the traditional region of Lower Carniola and is now part of the Central Slovenia Statistical Region. A small chapel in the settlement dates to the early 20th century.Slovenian Ministry of Culture register of national heritage reference number ešd 18458 ==References== ==External links== * *Dolgo Brdo on Geopedia Category:Populated places in the City Municipality of Ljubljana Category:Sostro District
title: Dolgo Brdo, Ljubljana
